Commentary.ab: Y22.27a-b †āfrauuaṣ̌e] sec. cod.; Geldner, Kellens āfrauuaṣ̌i. Wolff, 1910 p. 58 †ā †frauuaṣ̌e as repetition of the praevb. ā from āiiese? Or particle ā + voc. sg. (vid. Dunkel, 2014, p. II.208)? Cf. āiiese yešti + voc. VrS25.11 (cf. Commentary VrS1.9).

Parallels.ab: āiiese yešti āfrauuaṣ̌i ahurahe mazdā̊ ~ Y26.1, Y59.20, VrS81.19, DrYt4.10, Yt13.80 yazamaide frauuaṣ̌īm auuąm yąm ahurahe mazdā̊.
āiiese yešti āfrauuaṣ̌i [...] aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ~ Yt13.82 aṣ̌āunąm vaŋᵛhīš sūrā̊ spəṇtā° frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide yā̊ aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm.
āiiese yešti āfrauuaṣ̌i gaiiehe marəϑnō zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe ~ Yt13.87 gaiiehe marəϑnō aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide [...] zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe iδa aṣ̌aōnō aṣ̌īmca frauuaṣ̌īmca yazamaide.
āiiese yešti āfrauuaṣ̌i [...] kauuōiš vīštāspahe ~ Yt13.99 kauuōiš vīštāspahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide.
āiiese yešti āfrauuaṣ̌i [...] isat̰.vāstrahe zaraϑuštrōiš ~ Yt13.98 isat̰.vāstrahe zaraϑuštrōiš aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌īm yazamaide.
